name: TrueSight Pulse Win PDH Test
description: Generic specification for Windows performance counters

paramSchema.title: Metric Name
paramSchema.name: metric
paramSchema.description: The name of the metric the counter will be mapped to.

paramSchema.title: Counter
paramSchema.name: counter
paramSchema.description: The counter path for the windows performance metric

paramSchema.title: Factor
paramSchema.name: factor
paramSchema.description: The multiplication factor for the metric
